questions.question: What is the cardinality of the power set of a set with 5 elements?
Which of the following is a valid logical equivalence?
What is the coefficient of x^2y^3 in the expansion of (x + 2y)^5?
How many different ways can you arrange the letters in the word 'MISSISSIPPI'?
Which of the following is a graph that is both a tree and a complete graph?
What is the chromatic number of a bipartite graph?
options: Depends on the number of vertices

questions.question: Which of the following is a recursive definition for the Fibonacci sequence?
What is the solution to the recurrence relation T(n) = 2T(n/2) + n with base case T(1) = 1?
What is the principle of mathematical induction used for?
options: To prove statements about natural numbers

questions.question: What is the Pigeonhole Principle?
options: If there are more pigeons than pigeonholes, then at least one pigeonhole must contain more than one pigeon.
If there are more pigeonholes than pigeons, then at least one pigeonhole must contain more than one pigeon.
If there are the same number of pigeons and pigeonholes, then each pigeonhole must contain exactly one pigeon.
